# Welcome to the Dynatrace Platform Engineering Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad helps engineering teams understand how an Internal Developer Platform (IDP) can accelerate software delivery and improve resilience at scale. It brings together essential resources—such as architectural blueprints, automation scripts, integration patterns, and best practices—into one centralized hub.  

Platform engineers can use it to:
* Provision self-service development environments with secure, compliant templates
* Enable rapid feedback loops through integrated CI/CD pipelines and observability tooling
* Operationalize DevSecOps and SRE principles by embedding security, reliability, and performance into workflows
* Reduce cognitive load for developers by abstracting infrastructure complexity

You can view the following documentation to learn how to [Dynatrace for Platform Engineering](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/platform-engineering)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

# **Explore Dynatrace Documentation for Platform Engineering & IDP**

Unlock the full potential of platform engineering and Internal Developer Platforms (IDPs) with Dynatrace. Below is a categorized guide to essential resources:

---

## **Operate**  

[Cloud Cost Optimization](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/cost-and-carbon-optimization)  
Combine network, infrastructure, and billing data to identify top cost contributors and optimize cloud resources using compression and hyperscaler tools.  

[AI Observability](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/dynatrace-for-ai-observability)  
Track usage and consumption of generative AI tools in DevOps portals and IDPs. Use observability data for proper sizing and configuration to improve reliability and manage costs.  

[Infrastructure Observability](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/infrastructure-monitoring)  
Trace performance issues to their source. Apply Golden Paths and as-code templates to understand relationships between hosts, processes, and dependencies.  

[Kubernetes Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/how-it-works-k8s-kubernetes-monitoring)  
Cluster lifecycle management with centralised telemetry. Visualize and analyze data across the Kubernetes stack and enable configuration actions based on observability insights.  

---

## **Predict**  

[Predictive Analysis](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/self-service-kubernetes-tutorial)  
Use predictive AI for forecasting to automate disk resizing and resource allocation in cloud-native environments, reducing outages and improving efficiency.  

[Forecasting in Workflow Automation](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/davis-workflow-integration#install-davis-for-workflows)  
Leverage predictive AI to automate ticket creation and proactive actions before issues arise, reducing manual effort and improving response times.  

---

## **Prevent**  

[Bug Prevention](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/detect-problems-with-logs)  
Analyze application logs from production environments to automatically create tickets and assign work to development teams, preventing customer-facing bugs.  


[Continuous Security Posture Awareness](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/spm-hub)  
Gain a unified view of exposures across environments. Prioritize vulnerabilities, automate remediation, and maintain live security reports for proactive risk management.  

---

## **Resolve**  

[Problem Notifications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/problem-notifications)  
Automatically triage issues using observability and security data combined with ownership metadata. Trigger workflows for communication, ticketing, and remediation actions.  

[Error Budget Alerting](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/slo-overview)  
Focus on issues impacting Service-Level Objectives by monitoring error budget burn rates and automating stakeholder notifications.  

---  

## **Protect**  

[Security Alerts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/notifications-hub-rva)  
Reduce event storms by consolidating and deduplicating security alerts. Automate ticket creation and assignment based on ownership.  

[Threat Detection](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/threats-exploits)  
Ingest and contextualize security data for detailed analytics. Automate workflows to elevate critical incidents and prioritize based on importance.  

---

## **Improve**  

[Always-on App Profiling](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/profiling-optimization)  
dentify performance bottlenecks in CPU, memory, and thread usage. Optimize applications for scalability and efficiency.  

[Kubernetes Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/kubernetes-monitoring)  
Continuously adjust Kubernetes resource requests and limits based on metrics and SLOs to reduce costs and improve utilization.  

---

### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
